sentence.Network_en: Gun ownership by law-abiding people was not a problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 让守法的人持有枪械并不会惹麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: The folk-song world was another of his abiding interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 民歌是他的另一个始终不渝的爱好。

sentence.Network_en: By and large, these people are peace-loving, law-abiding citizens.
sentence.Network_cn: 大体上，这些人都是热爱和平、遵纪守法的公民。

新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... abhor ? vt. 憎恶, 痛恨 abiding ? adj. 永久的，持久的 abject ? adj. 卑微的；精神不振的.
a开头的形容词_百度知道 ... abhorrent a.厌恶的 abiding a.持久不变的，永久的 abject a.极可怜的，卑屈的.
They are too abiding to acquiescent ., 他们太守法 , 太温顺了.

list.abs: abiding英语的解释,abiding的英语翻... ... an abiding faith 不变的信念 abiding friendship 持久的友谊 abiding place 住宅, 家.
abide 遵守abiding place 住宅abiding 容忍
词语的固定搭配_百度文库 ... as yet 到目前(那时)为止 abide by 坚持;遵守 accustom to 使习惯.
vt.容忍abide by遵守，履行I can not abide him.我对他忍无可忍
we must abide by traffic regulations ., 我们必须遵守交通规则.

entry.tran: （情感、记忆、兴趣等）持久的，长久的
entry.def: An abiding feeling, memory, or interest is one that you have for a very long time.

example.ex: He has a genuine and abiding love of the craft...
example.tran: 他对这门手艺有着真挚持久的热爱。

example.ex: One of my abiding memories of him is of his singing to a small private party...
example.tran: 我对他难以忘怀的一幕是他在一次小型私人派对上献歌的情景。

auth_sentence.content: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.
auth_sentence.res_content: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.

auth_sentence.content: By Japan's law-abiding standards, crime is epidemic.
auth_sentence.res_content: By Japan's law-abiding standards, crime is epidemic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By Japan's law-abiding standards, crime is epidemic.

auth_sentence.content: The unfair competition between law-abiding and tax-evading firms.
auth_sentence.res_content: The unfair competition between law-abiding and tax-evading firms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The unfair competition between law-abiding and tax-evading firms.

sentences.en: I’m tired of your abiding complaints.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你没完没了的抱怨。

sentences.en: He had an abiding love of the English countryside.
sentences.cn: 他永远热爱英国的乡村。

sentences.en: My abiding memory of our first meeting is of a girl too shy to talk.
sentences.cn: 我永远记得我们初次见面时她是一个羞得连话都不敢说的女孩。

jushi.english: The experience left me with an abiding hatred of dogs.
jushi.chinese: 这次经历使我从此永远讨厌狗。

jushi.english: Their abiding love moved us a great deal.
jushi.chinese: 他们恒久不变的爱令我们大为感动。

jushi.english: Reading is one of my abiding interest.
jushi.chinese: 阅读是我持久不变的兴趣之一。
